name: iPhone 12
description: The iPhone 12 features a Super Retina XDR display, A14 Bionic chip, and 5G capability.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Galaxy S21 comes with a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Exynos 2100/Snapdragon 888 processor, and an impressive camera system.

name: Google Pixel 5
description: The Pixel 5 boasts a 90Hz OLED display, Snapdragon 765G processor, and the power of Google's computational photography.

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
description: The OnePlus 9 Pro features a Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and Hasselblad partnership for enhanced camera capabilities.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11
description: The Mi 11 offers a 6.81-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and a versatile camera setup.

name: Huawei P40 Pro
description: The P40 Pro showcases a 6.58-inch OLED display, Kirin 990 5G processor, and Leica-engineered quad-camera system.

name: Sony Xperia 1 III
description: The Xperia 1 III boasts a 6.5-inch 4K HDR OLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and advanced camera technology.

name: LG Velvet
description: The LG Velvet features a 6.8-inch P-OLED display, Snapdragon 765G processor, and a sleek design.

name: Motorola Edge+
description: The Motorola Edge+ offers a 6.7-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 865 processor, and a 108MP camera sensor.

name: Nokia 8.3
description: The Nokia 8.3 comes with a 6.81-inch IPS LCD display, Snapdragon 765G processor, and ZEISS optics for photography enthusiasts.

name: MacBook Air
description: A lightweight and portable notebook.

name: Dell XPS 15
description: A powerful laptop for multimedia and gaming.

name: HP Envy 13
description: A stylish and performance-oriented laptop.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: A business-oriented and durable notebook.

name: Asus ROG Zephyrus G14
description: A gaming laptop with powerful hardware.

name: Acer Swift 3
description: A budget-friendly and lightweight laptop.

name: Microsoft Surface Book 3
description: A versatile 2-in-1 laptop and tablet.

name: Razer Blade 15
description: A high-performance gaming laptop.

name: LG Gram 14
description: An ultra-lightweight and long-lasting battery laptop.

name: Lenovo Yoga C940
description: A versatile 2-in-1 laptop with a premium design.
